body:
This is probably the most pitiful guy I've ever seen, and that Cuck...
Usually, I would enjoy a quality work like this, but the storyline really gets to me, a lot more than some of the darker NTR. Maybe its because in these stories, the husband actually knew what was going on, and that sense of helplessness as he has to watch two people he cares about taken, violated, and twisted due to his own 'inadequacy'...
Yeah, 'Ignorance is Bliss', as they say.
Recommended for Higher than average artwork and scene seamlessly matching together, but not for the plot. The aspect that makes small doses of NTR somewhat attractive here was far too potent for me to even think about Masturbating despite the erection I had from the really nice scenes, which eventually turned flaccid from the horrible feeling I felt for the cucked protagonist.
For those that can handle it better, you will probably enjoy it a lot more.
Not sure why I left this message, except maybe imagining a pleasant after story...
bruh....HUUUUHHH????? If aint this the most cucked thing ive seen.
t h i s  i s  t r a s h
I hope the husband actually cheated or else it ill be pissed cus it will be fucking dumb.
